00010 ## \brief Framework for dynamic models
00011 #
00012 #
00013 class DynamicFramework(frameworkBase.FrameworkBase):
00014   ## \brief Constructor
00015   #
00016   # \param userModel class containing the user model
00017   # \param lastTimeStep last timestep to run
00018   # \param firstTimestep sets the starting timestep of the model (optional,
00019   #        default is 1)
00020   #
00021   def __init__(self, userModel, lastTimeStep=0, firstTimestep=1):
00022     frameworkBase.FrameworkBase.__init__(self)
00023 
00024     self._d_model = userModel
00025     self._testRequirements()
00026 
00027 
00028     # fttb
00029     self._addMethodToClass(self._readmapNew)
00030     self._addMethodToClass(self._reportNew)
00031 
00032     try:
00033       self._userModel()._setNrTimeSteps(lastTimeStep)
00034       self._d_firstTimestep = firstTimestep
00035       self._userModel()._setFirstTimeStep(self._d_firstTimestep)
00036     except Exception, msg:
00037       sys.stderr.write('Error: %s\n' % str(msg))
00038       sys.exit(1)
00039 
00040 
00041   def _userModel(self):
00042     """ Returns the class provided by the user """
00043     return self._d_model
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048 
00049   ## \brief Re-implemented from ShellScript.
00050   #
00051   # Runs a dynamic user model.
00052   def run(self):
00053     self._atStartOfScript()
00054     if(hasattr(self._userModel(), "resume")):
00055       if self._userModel().firstTimeStep() == 1:
00056         self._runInitial()
00057       else:
00058         self._runResume()
00059     else:
00060       self._runInitial()
00061 
00062     self._runDynamic()
00063 
00064     # only execute this section while running filter frameworks
00065     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "suspend") and hasattr(self._userModel(), "filterPeriod"):
00066       self._runSuspend()
00067 
00068     return 0
00069 
00070 
00071   ## \brief testing the requirements for the dynamic framework
00072   #
00073   # To use the dynamic framework the user must implement the following methods
00074   # in this class:
00075   # - either "run" or "initial" and "dynamic"
00076   def _testRequirements(self):
00077     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "_userModel"):
00078       msg = "The _userModel method is deprecated and obsolete"
00079       self.showWarning(msg)
00080 
00081     if( not hasattr(self._userModel(), "dynamic") and not hasattr(self._userModel(), "run")):
00082       msg = "Cannot run dynamic framework: Implement dynamic method"
00083       raise frameworkBase.FrameworkError(msg)
00084 
00085 
00086     if not hasattr(self._userModel(), "initial"):
00087       if self._debug():
00088         self.showWarning("No initial section defined.")
00089 
00090   def setQuiet(self, quiet):
00091     self._d_quiet = quiet
